name: Canon EF-M 55-200mm f/4.5-6.3 IS STM Lens
Description: A compact zoom lens for EOS-M cameras that takes you closer to the action. An Image Stabilizer protects against blur from camera shake. STM technology delivers smooth, quiet focusing when shooting movies.

name: Canon EF 100-400mm f/4.5-5.6 L IS II USM Lens
Description: A compact, high-performance 100-400mm zoom lens thats ideal for those shooting sports, action and wildlife photography. A 4-stop Image Stabilizer and high-quality optics deliver superb sharpness.

name: Canon RF 35mm f/1.8 IS STM Macro Lens
Description: Another perfect portraiture and macro lens that Canon has released is the Canon RF 35mm f/1.8 IS STM Macro Lens with much more added. With great advantages added to this sophisticated lens that includes an extremely short minimum focus distance of just 17cm, a powerful f/1.8 aperture ideal for low-light photography, 5-stop image stabilisation, an Ultrasonic Autofocus thats fast and accurate, and aspherical lens elements added to boost image quality.

name: Canon RF 24mm f/1.8 Macro IS STM Lens
Description: The Canon RF 24mm f/1.8 Macro IS STM Lens is designed to provide a perfect mixture between a broad field of view and close focusing. The combination of the two above features makes it possible to shoot at close range while still maintaining a broad sense of space with increased depth of field.

name: Canon RF 800mm f/11 IS STM Lens
Description: The Canon RF 800mm f/11 IS STM Lens is a powerful and super telephoto prime lens that allows you to reach really far fetched subjects and bringing them much closer. The RF 800mm lens provides superior 4-stop image stabilisation and a higher focal length than the RF 600mm lens, which is ideal for travel-wildlife enthusiast and also for aviation photography.

name: Nikon AF-S 50mm f/1.8G Lens
Description: This updated classic with a fast maximum aperture is ideal for everyday shooting, perfect in low lighting situations and great for producing images with beautiful background blur (Bokeh).

name: Nikon Z 35mm f/1.8 S Lens
Description: The sophisticated Nikon Z 35mm f/1.8 S is a beautiful compact full frame mirrorless Z-mount prime lens for the latest Nikon mirrorless cameras. Designed to capture wide-angle shots with superb quality, with high speed and highly accurate autofocus control via the adoption of a multi-focusing system and a maximum f/1.8 aperture that performs exceptionally well in low-light conditions. Outstanding features of the Nikon Z 35mm f/1.8 lens include: rendering performance and suppresses aberrations to the maximum possible extent, two ED glass elements and three aspherical lens elements to ensure crisp, brilliant images with rich colour and deep contrast; anti-reflective Nano Crystal Coating that effectively reduces ghosting and flare for impressive image clarity, rounded 9-blade diaphragm to create astonishing bokeh; smooth, silent and precise autofocus with high-speed, large-capacity data transfer between the lens and camera.

name: Nikon NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S Lens
Description: The Nikon Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S Lens is the smallest, lightest 400mm super-telephoto prime lens in its class that's designed for traveling light and to operate swiftly.

name: Canon RF 24mm f/1.8 Macro IS STM Lens
Description: The Nikon NIKKOR Z DX 16-50mm f/3.5-6.3 VR Lens is the smallest DX format zoom lens ever, offering photographers a brilliant wide-angle field of view. The all-around lens is designed for everyday shooting and ensures to deliver the quality you expect throughout it's focal length.

name: Nikon Z 24-120mm f/4 S Lens
Description: The Nikon Z 24-120mm f/4 S Lens is a wide-angle to short-telephoto zoom lens designed for everyday use covering an exceptionally wide range of focal lengths to benefit a wide variety of applications for the landscape to portrait. A constant f/4 aperture offers consistent aperture throughout the zoom range.
